column6: AVENGERS DISASSEMBLED TIE-IN! "FOURTITUDE" FINALE! PART 3 (OF 3) Galactus the World-Eater is coming to Earth to choose one of the Fantastic Four as his new herald -but which one?  The consequences of his choice will set the tone and scope of the series, a
